title: Impact Network Founder on Black Progress and Plight
itunes:title: Impact Network Founder on Black Progress and Plight
description:
Bishop Wayne T. Jackson, Founder & CEO of the Impact Network, discusses the importance of Black History month to Black businesses. He also talks about systemic issues that have perpetuated inequalities and points out progress that is being made.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
